subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mirza Teletovic made a foul shot with 4 seconds left, and the Nets reserves rallied from a 12-point deficit to beat the host Boston Celtics in a preseason game.
snippet: Mirza Teletovic made a foul shot with 4 seconds left, and the Nets reserves rallied from a 12-point deficit to beat the host Boston Celtics in a preseason game.
